features: ✔️Space-Saving Side Table For Couch: Space-Saving Side Table For Your Couch: If you're looking for space-saving furniture for a small room, this compact sofa table is perfect for you. It doesn't require much space but is incredibly useful as a versatile side table, coffee table, or snack holder.

✔️Multipurpose Couch Tray: Simplify your life with a versatile armchair table that serves multiple purposes. This sofa tray can be used as a convenient food or drink tray, a handy snack side table, a reliable coffee cup holder, a stylish wine table, a bathtub tray caddy or even a functional couch armrest table built-in a tablet slot for your phone. Enjoy the flexibility and convenience tables tray brings to your cozy moments on the couch.

✔️Easy To Assemble:The height of C-shaped side TV table tray table can be adjusted to your liking from 18” to 33”. The panel also has a 360° rotation feature, allowing for flexible adjustment. Enjoy the freedom to customize it to your preferred table leg angle and position under the couch or bed for your convenience

✔️Practical Gift For Families, Couples, Or Students: This sofa armrest table height is suitable for both adults and kids, providing enough space to comfortably accommodate your laptop, books, and drinks and easily matches any living room decor. Offer it as a housewarming, new home, birthday, or Christmas gift to your loved ones.Experience the ultimate convenience and functionality with our TV trays.

【Timely After-Sales Service】: We stand behind the quality of our small side couch end table and promise a 100% solution if it does not meet your expectations. Our customer service team is available 24/7 and will solve any issues within 48 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice small table!
reviews.reviewText: The table is easy to assemble & very sturdy. It fits perfectly into a small space and allows height adjustment. The bamboo & black metal looks cool 😁👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent & sturdy side table
reviews.reviewText: Love the look of this table. It is very sturdy, solid piece. It is great for a lazy boy chair side table. Very easy to assemble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to build, relatively sturdy for size, easy to use and move, very convenient, waterproofAll around the perfect tray table

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The item is smaller than expected. However, it turns out it is a perfect size!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Sturdy and easy to assemble. Works well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It would have been 5 stars if...
reviews.reviewText: It was easy to assemble and the description was right on. I would have given it 5 stars if there wasn't any wood damages. The damaged probably occurred in shipping.UPDATE: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐I received an unsolicited response from the vendor regarding the product damage. The follow up was greatly appreciated. I would definitely purchase from Yuhfera again. Their commitment to their products is important. The side table is the perfect size, assembled easily and is making my husband's post surgery recovery easier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The table does not rotate unless you undo the height adjustment. When you undo the height the table will fall to minimum height. This means you must clear the table before rotating it.It can in theory be rotated 360 degrees, but if you stop around 180, so the table is opposite the base it become very unstable.If you watch the video carefully you will notice the bottom of the stand contact the foot of the couch when it rotated by the model.
